title: Fall 2020 Final Examination Period Ends
description: Last final examinations given by the university for the Fall 2020 semester. More Information can be found here: https://registrar.unc.edu/event/spring-2021-registration-begins-for-all-graduate-degree-seeking-post-baccalaureate-and-professional-students-for-undergraduate-students-with-8-or-more-terms-in-residence/

title: Spring 2021 Registration Begins
description: Spring 2021 Registration begins for all degree seeking students with 8+ terms in residence. 7 terms in residence begins 12/01. 6 terms in residence begins 12/02. 5 terms in residence begins 12/03. 4 terms in residence begins 12/04. 3 terms in residence begins 12/07. 2 terms in residence begins 12/08. 1 term in residence begins 12/09. 0 terms in residence begins 12/10. More  info can be found: https://registrar.unc.edu/event/spring-2021-registration-begins-for-all-graduate-degree-seeking-post-baccalaureate-and-professional-students-for-undergraduate-students-with-8-or-more-terms-in-residence/

title: Maximum Enrollment Increase
description: Undergraduate maximum credit limit increases from 17 to 18 credit hours for full-time students. More information found: https://registrar.unc.edu/event/max-enrollment-increase/

title: First Day of Classes
description: First day of the 2021 Spring semester for all students. Last day to enroll in tuition installment payment plan. Late registration begins ($20 fee). More information found: https://registrar.unc.edu/event/spring-2021-classses-begin/

title: Last Day of Add/Drop Period
description: Last day to add or drop a class without showing it on the student's transcript. Last day for students to enroll in a class on ConnectCarolina. More information found: https://registrar.unc.edu/event/last-day-for-all-students-to-add-a-course-to-their-schedule-in-connectcarolina-for-spring/

title: Last Day to Be Removed From a Waitlist
description: Students will be moved into any available seats in Spring classes for the last time. More information found: https://registrar.unc.edu/event/waitlist-purged/

title: Off-Record Course Drop Deadline
description: Last Day to Drop a Class with No Record. Last day for students or schools/dept. to drop a class in ConnectCarolina and reduce course load, with tuition adjusted and no record of the class. Full time students must maintain 12 credit hours. Courses dropped after this date will show on the students transcript with a W.

title: Off-Record Course Drop Deadline
description: Drop transactions processed between weeks 3-8 will remain on the studentâ€™s record with a grade of withdrawal. No tuition refund. Courses dropped after this date will receive a grade of incomplete. More information: https://registrar.unc.edu/event/last-day-for-all-undergraduate-students-to-drop-courses-in-connectcarolina/

title: Pass/Fail Deadline
description: Last day for all Undergraduate Students to submit Pass/Fail declarations. More information: https://registrar.unc.edu/event/last-day-for-all-undergraduate-students-to-submit-pass-fail-declarations-2/

title: No Classes: Easter
description: Easter Holiday

title: Spring 2021 Commencement
description: Commencement for the Class of Spring 2021 Graduates. More info: https://registrar.unc.edu/event/spring-2021-commencement/

title: Study Abroad Applications Due
description: Majority of study abroad applications, recommendations, and application fees due. More info: https://heelsabroad.unc.edu/index.cfm?FuseAction=Programs.ListAll

title: Spring Tuition Due
description: Tuition and Fees Due for all students who have registered before the Billing Date. Students who register by the Billing Date must pay or defer tuition and fees by this date or their schedule will be cancelled and all their courses dropped. More info: https://cashier.unc.edu/tuition-fees/important-dates/
